articles.description: Since March bow-tied vaccine researcher Peter Hotez has worked to convey a scientist’s view of COVID-19 to everyday Americans. This week, he agreed to answer readers’ questions about vaccines.
articles.content:
Since March bow-tied vaccine researcher Peter Hotez has worked to convey a scientist’s view of COVID-19 to everyday Americans. This week, he agreed to answer readers’ questions about vaccines.
